name: ⭒ Princess Soleil and The Great Space Slime ⭒
name_original: ⭒ Princess Soleil and The Great Space Slime ⭒
description:
hello there! i originally made this game in scratch for a school project and i was really proud of what i was able to do :]  

im not familiar with game design and coding so please bear with me! 

note:

-there is character animation but i didn't know how to code that in

- there were gonna be enemies but i didn't know how to code that in as well (lol)

- if it glitches, or if you want to play again then refresh the page 

Credits: 

Art/Story/level design by shisinn ( me :] )

Code by Griffpatch

please enjoy!
